descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Blockies VR is a single player action-puzzle game where you knock down block buildings and protect friendly Blockies against the forces of evil. Launch a wide range of objects at enemies in this low-poly physics world. Travel to the Kingdom’s shop to expand your weapon arsenal to take on the most difficult puzzles in all the land.

Features
-A dozen types of blocks that interact uniquely with the world
-A dozen AI enemy types each with their own abilities
-Levels where you must defend the Blockies from monster attacks
-Levels with intricate block puzzles to solve
-The Kingdom where cool new projectiles can be purchased
-Beautifully designed low poly environments
-At least 50 levels by full release (Currently 16)
-With enough support: Level Editor to create and share new levels
-With enough support: Co-op and Multiplayer Functionality

Join the Discord to learn more about future updates, and provide your own feedback of what you want in the game!
